title: Crater Lake National Park: Animal Sounds
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Animal Sounds                What was that noise?       Crater Lake has been recording natural sounds throughout the park since 2011. Here are some animals that have been recorded in the park: coyote, elk, porcupine, insect, birds, and spotted owl. Try to match these animals with the sounds below.               Mystery sound                         Mystery sound                         Mystery sound                         Mystery sound                         Mystery sound                         Mystery sound                         Mystery sound                  And the matches are ... Coyote, Elk, two Spotted Owls, Porcupine, birds, insect, Common Nighthawk plus a mystery animal crashing through the forest.
